about_the_game:
Contents included in the demo version:

Full Episode 1 "The Forest", including 3 introductory puzzles and 6 more complex puzzles. Additionally, clues about the whereabouts of Henry's chicken are included, as well as part of the history of the town of Arcton in which the story takes place. The demo ends after the defeat of the first area boss.

Full introduction to the game:

Cosmic Horror Tales is a top-down action RPG in which you take on the role of Henry, a farmer who leaves home at night to save one of his precious lost chickens, delving deeper and deeper into a story full of unspeakable horrors.

Game features:

  • Control the on and off of your flashlight to prevent dangers and find clues.

  • Manage your resources, the physical and mental health of your character will be constantly at risk.

  • Immerse yourself in Arcton, a mining town in the mid-19th century.

  • Solve puzzles as you uncover the history of the village.

  • Written, drawn, and coded by Moss Tower. Soundtrack by Arin Eakins.

content_descriptors.notes: The game presents animated violence, blood, monsters and scenes that, together with the mystery setting, can generate fear or terror in some people.
